            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Synoptic Water Quality Study was initiated in 1980 by federal, provincial, and academic partners to monitor lake health in the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia. The synoptic water quality surveys—measuring major ions, nutrients, pH, organic matter, and trace elements—have been conducted on a decadal basis on a set of ~50 lakes. This dataset contains the measurements collected during the 2021 sampling campaign.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-sx7h-qc61
notes: The Synoptic Water Quality Study was initiated in 1980 by federal, provincial, and academic partners to monitor lake health in the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia. The synoptic water quality surveys—measuring major ions, nutrients, pH, organic matter, and trace elements—have been conducted on a decadal basis on a set of ~50 lakes. This dataset contains the measurements collected during the 2021 sampling campaign.

notes_translated.en: The Synoptic Water Quality Study was initiated in 1980 by federal, provincial, and academic partners to monitor lake health in the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia. The synoptic water quality surveys—measuring major ions, nutrients, pH, organic matter, and trace elements—have been conducted on a decadal basis on a set of ~50 lakes. This dataset contains the measurements collected during the 2021 sampling campaign.
notes_translated.fr: L'étude synoptique sur la qualité de l'eau a été lancée en 1980 par des partenaires fédéraux, provinciaux et universitaires afin de surveiller la santé des lacs de la municipalité régionale d'Halifax, en Nouvelle-Écosse. Les études synoptiques de la qualité de l'eau, qui mesurent les principaux ions, les nutriments, le pH, la matière organique et les oligo-éléments, ont été menées sur une base décennale dans un ensemble d'environ 50 lacs. Ce jeu de données contient les mesures collectées lors de la campagne d'échantillonnage 2021.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: 2021 Synoptic Water Quality Study Data

title_translated.fr: Données de l'étude synoptique sur la qualité de l'eau 2021
